name: T'EDEN ORAY: Dangers of the Lost Valley
name_original: T'EDEN ORAY: Dangers of the Lost Valley
description:
Welcome to T'EDEN ORAY: Dangers of the Lost Valley!

This is it! The sibling adventurers have managed to discover the legendary land ofT'Eden Oray! However, this valley may not be as welcoming as it seems. Follow the sibling adventurers as they brave the dangers of the lost valley!

Author's Notes

The core game is now complete and running! You can now through all chapter 1, 2, and 3!

However, there is still a lot of work to do:

  • Complete the graphics
  • Complete the audio

You can let me now what you think in the comments down below.
